summary: After inheriting half of a house, a young woman develops an unexpected friendship with her co-owner.
cast: Lacey Chabert|Brennan Elliott|Edward Asner|Greyston Holt|Daniel Cudmore|Heather Doerksen|Barbara Pollard|Patrick Sabongui|Drew Ray Tanner|Paul McGillion|Holly Hougham|Chris Cochrane|Michael Roberds|Cardi Wong|Tom Tasse|Devin Johnston|Jennifer Oleksiuk|David Bloom|Peter Kelamis|Carolyn Adair
title: All of My Heart
